item.description:
We will be hiking Mount Osceola via the Mount Osceola Trail.

Please read the description of this hike below. Alll hikers are responsible for reading, understanding and agreeing to the hikers responsibility code and waiver found on this site. Please know your abilitities prior to signing up.

The trail leaves Tripoli Rd. and climbs moderately with somewhat rocky footing, going east across the south slope of Breadtray Ridge. It begins to climb by switchbacks toward the ridge top, and the footing improves. A ledge on the left offers a view of Sandwich Mountain, and it crosses a small brook (unreliable). The trail resumes its switchbacks, gains the summit ridge and turns right, and soon reaches the summit ledge, with excellent views. A good outlook to the north can be obtained from a small ledge on a short side path, which begins at the older fire tower site that is located in the woods just to the west of the open ledge.
to Mt Osceola

Totals
Distance 3.20 mi
Time 2 hr 41 min
Elev Gain +2180 ft
Elev Loss -164 ft
Elev Change +2016 ft

Driving Directions
Show in Google Earth
Download to GPS

Back to here hike 1.00 mi/40 min/-150 ft on the Mount Osceola Trail
The trail then turns left and descends from the summit, alternating flat stretches with steep, rocky descents. Just before reaching the main pass between Osceola and East Osceola, it descends a steep chimney, which can be avoided by a detour to the left (north). The trail crosses the pass and climbs moderately with steep pitches past a fine outlook on the left, reaching the summit of East Osceola (marked by a small cairn).
to East Osceola

Totals
Distance 4.20 mi
Time 3 hr 21 min
Elev Gain +2526 ft
Elev Loss -660 ft
Elev Change +1866 ft

Driving Directions
Show in Google Earth
Download to GPS

Back to here hike 1.00 mi/40 min/+150 ft on the Mount Osceola Trail
The trail reaches the summit of East Osceola (marked by a small cairn). It descends moderately with steep pitches past a fine outlook on the right. The trail continues to descend then ascends a steep chimney, which can be avoided by a detour to the right (north). The trail then reaches the main pass between Osceola and East Osceola. The trail then turns and ascends to the summit, alternating flat stretches with steep, rocky ascents.
to Mt Osceola
hike 3.20 mi/2 hr 41 min/-2016 ft on the Mount Osceola Trail
The trail gains the summit ledge with excellent views. A good outlook to the north can be obtained from a small ledge on a short side path, which begins at the older fire tower site that is located in the woods just to the west of the open ledge. The trail descends to the summit ridge then switchbacks down the slope. It crosses a small brook and a ledge on the right offers a view of Sandwich Mountain. The trail resumes its switchbacks and reaches the south slope of Breadtray Ridge. It descends moderately with somewhat rocky footing, to its terminus at Tripoli Rd.
to Mount Osceola Trailhead
item.how_to_find_us: DIANNE AND I WILL BE IN A BLACK FOUR DOOR ECHO WITH MAINE PLATES
item.name: OSCEOLA'S
